00001 #include <unittest++/UnitTest++.h>
00002 
00003 #include "lastfmclientmock.h"
00004 #include "lastfmlib/lastfmscrobbler.h"
00005 
00006 #include <ctime>
00007 #include <unistd.h>
00008 #include <iostream>
00009 
00010 using namespace std;
00011 
00012 class LastFmScrobblerTester : public LastFmScrobbler
00013 {
00014 public:
00015     LastFmScrobblerTester(bool synchronous)
00016     : LastFmScrobbler(synchronous)
00017     {
00018         pMock = new LastFmClientMock();
00019         m_pLastFmClient = pMock;
00020     }
00021 
00022     void setLastConnectionAttempt(time_t time)
00023     {
00024         m_LastConnectionAttempt = time;
00025     }
00026 
00027     void setTrackPlayTime(time_t time)
00028     {
00029         m_TrackPlayTime = time;
00030     }
00031 
00032     void setTrackResumeTime(time_t time)
00033     {
00034         m_TrackResumeTime = time;
00035     }
00036 
00037     void waitForAuthenticationFinish()
00038     {
00039         m_AuthenticateThread.join();
00040     }
00041 
00042     void waitForSendInfoFinish()
00043     {
00044         m_SendInfoThread.join();
00045     }
00046 
00047     LastFmClientMock* pMock;
00048 };
00049 
00050 SUITE(LastFmScrobblerTest)
00051 {
00052     TEST(TestLastFmScrobbler)
00053     {
00054         LastFmScrobblerTester scrobbler(true);
00055 
00056         SubmissionInfo info("Artist", "Track");
00057 
00058         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info);
00059         CHECK(scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00060         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCalled);
00061         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCollectionCalled);
00062         CHECK_EQUAL("Artist", scrobbler.pMock->m_LastRecPlayingInfo.getArtist());
00063     }
00064 
00065     TEST(TestLastFmScrobblerThreaded)
00066     {
00067         LastFmScrobblerTester scrobbler(false);
00068 
00069         SubmissionInfo info("Artist", "Track");
00070 
00071         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info);
00072         scrobbler.waitForAuthenticationFinish();
00073         scrobbler.waitForSendInfoFinish();
00074 
00075         CHECK(scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00076         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCalled);
00077         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCollectionCalled);
00078         CHECK_EQUAL("Artist", scrobbler.pMock->m_LastRecPlayingInfo.getArtist());
00079     }
00080 
00081     TEST(TestLastFmScrobblerConnectionFailed)
00082     {
00083         LastFmScrobblerTester scrobbler(true);
00084         scrobbler.pMock->m_HandShakeThrowConnectionError = true;
00085 
00086         SubmissionInfo info1("Artist1", "Track1");
00087         info1.setTrackLength(100);
00088 
00089         SubmissionInfo info2("Artist2", "Track2");
00090         info2.setTrackLength(100);
00091 
00092         SubmissionInfo info3("Artist3", "Track3");
00093         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info1);
00094         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00095 
00096         //make sure track has played long enough
00097         scrobbler.setTrackPlayTime(100);
00098         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info2);
00099         usleep(1000000);
00100         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00101         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCalled);
00102         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCollectionCalled);
00103 
00104         //force immediate reconnect
00105         scrobbler.pMock->m_HandShakeThrowConnectionError = false;
00106         scrobbler.setLastConnectionAttempt(0);
00107         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info3);
00108         CHECK(scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00109         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCalled);
00110         CHECK(scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCollectionCalled);
00111 
00112         string post = scrobbler.pMock->m_LastRecSubmitInfoCollection.getPostData();
00113         CHECK(string::npos != post.find("Artist1"));
00114         CHECK(string::npos != post.find("Artist2"));
00115     }
00116 
00117     TEST(TestLastFmScrobblerConnectionFailedThreaded)
00118     {
00119         LastFmScrobblerTester scrobbler(false);
00120         scrobbler.pMock->m_HandShakeThrowConnectionError = true;
00121 
00122         SubmissionInfo info1("Artist1", "Track1");
00123         info1.setTrackLength(100);
00124 
00125         SubmissionInfo info2("Artist2", "Track2");
00126         info2.setTrackLength(100);
00127 
00128         SubmissionInfo info3("Artist3", "Track3");
00129         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info1);
00130         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00131 
00132         //make sure track has played long enough
00133         scrobbler.setTrackPlayTime(100);
00134 
00135         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info2);
00136         scrobbler.waitForAuthenticationFinish();
00137         scrobbler.waitForSendInfoFinish();
00138 
00139         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00140         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCalled);
00141         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCollectionCalled);
00142 
00143         //force immediate reconnect
00144         scrobbler.pMock->m_HandShakeThrowConnectionError = false;
00145         scrobbler.setLastConnectionAttempt(0);
00146 
00147         scrobbler.startedPlaying(info3);
00148         scrobbler.waitForAuthenticationFinish();
00149         scrobbler.waitForSendInfoFinish();
00150 
00151         CHECK(scrobbler.pMock->m_NowPlayingCalled);
00152         CHECK(!scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCalled);
00153         CHECK(scrobbler.pMock->m_SubmitCollectionCalled);
00154 
00155         string post = scrobbler.pMock->m_LastRecSubmitInfoCollection.getPostData();
00156         CHECK(string::npos != post.find("Artist1"));
00157         CHECK(string::npos != post.find("Artist2"));
00158     }
00159 }
